Text:
Download this codec pack

http://www.free-codecs.com/download/K_Lite_Mega_Codec_Pack.htm

and play it with "media player classic" included in the pack
simply getting coreavc and ac3-filter and playing in media player classic instead of installing a crap load of unneeded codecs works too

down load this instead
videolan.org 
you dont need any codecs or anything else 
it just work with everything even iso img or zip files
and you can transcode or stream with this program
